description: Retrieves the full information about the alert manager definition for a workspace.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace to retrieve the alert manager definition from.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the alert manager definition was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the alert manager definition was most recently changed.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The current status of the alert manager.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: If there is a failure, the reason for the failure.
